verses.roman:
eta bhāve rādhāra mana asthira ha-ilā
sakhī-gaṇa-āge prauḍhi-śloka ye paḍilā

synonyms: eta bhāve—in that mood; rādhāra—of Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī; mana—the mind; asthira ha-ilā—became agitated; sakhī-gaṇa-āge—before the friends, the gopīs; prauḍhi-śloka—advanced devotional verse; ye—which; paḍilā—She recited.
translation: In that mood, the mind of Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī was agitated, and therefore She spoke a verse of advanced devotion to Her gopī friends.
